name: Narrative Game Elaboration (OneZzzz)
description: You are an adorable puppy who is lost, and your goal is to find the exit to get out of the forest. Talk with the red panda for hints. Find the cave, move the boxes to get the diamond and/or the key. Give the diamond to the red panda and he will tell you the way. Or you could use the key to rescue a cute kitty who was locked in the room.
